trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCommand"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCommand"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Ta klasa nie może być dziedziczona.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand> event is raised when the Cancel button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand>Zdarzenie jest zgłaszane, gdy przycisk Anuluj dla elementu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>formant zostanie kliknięty.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand> event is raised when the Delete button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand>Zdarzenie jest zgłaszane, gdy przycisk Usuń elementu w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>formant zostanie kliknięty.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand> event is raised when the Edit button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand>Zdarzenie jest zgłaszane, gdy przycisk edycji elementu w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>formant zostanie kliknięty.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCommand> event is raised when any button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCommand>Zdarzenie jest zgłaszane, gdy przycisk dowolnego elementu w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>formant zostanie kliknięty.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically test for when a specific command button is clicked and take appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: Dzięki temu można programowo testowania po kliknięciu przycisku polecenia i podejmij odpowiednią akcję.

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to handle custom command buttons for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: To zdarzenie jest najczęściej używany do obsługi przyciski poleceń niestandardowych <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand> event is raised when the Update button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>Zdarzenie jest zgłaszane, gdy przycisk aktualizacji elementu w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>formant zostanie kliknięty.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of DataGridCommandEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać listę początkowe wartości właściwości dla wystąpienia DataGridCommandEventArgs, zobacz <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktora.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat obsługi zdarzeń, zobacz [NIB: zdarzenia i delegatów](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs"> </xref> klasy.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Ten konstruktor umożliwia tworzenie i inicjuje nowe wystąpienie <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs>klasy.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs> is created by a call to this constructor, the following properties are initialized to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Gdy wystąpienie klasy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs>zostanie utworzona przez wywołanie do tego konstruktora następujące właściwości są inicjowane do określonych wartości.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The value of the `commandSource` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.Item%2A>|The value of the `item` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Właściwość | Nieprawidłowa wartość | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| Wartość `commandSource` parametru. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.Item%2A>| Wartość `item` parametru. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> that represents the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> reprezentujący wybrany element w <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Źródło polecenia.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> zawierający dane zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera źródło polecenia.

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to determine the command source that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Użyj właściwości CommandSource, aby określić źródło polecenia, który wywołał zdarzenie.

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to determine which command raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Ta właściwość jest zwykle używana do określenia, które polecenie zgłoszone zdarzenie.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Źródło polecenia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the item containing the command source in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera element zawierający źródło polecenia w <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> formantu.

trans-unit.source: The Item property is used to access the properties of the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Właściwość elementu jest używana do dostępu do właściwości wybranego elementu w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> that represents the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> reprezentujący wybrany element w <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> formantu.
